verses.text: \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.+ 131.1 exerciseâ€¦: Heb. walk*+ 131.1 high: Heb. wonderful*
Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is* even as a weaned child.+ 131.2 myself: Heb. my soul*
Let Israel hope in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** from henceforth and for ever.+ 131.3 henceforth: Heb. now*
